Uses of Class
com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component.Component

  • Packages that use Component 
    Package Description
    com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component  

    • Uses of Component in com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component

      Subclasses of Component in com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Button
      Represents a rectangular button that can accept a listener to run code when the button is pressed.
      class  Label
      Represents a text string that can be drawn to the main window
      class  Panel
      Represents an area where components can be stored and drawn with its own relative coordinate system
      class  RadioButton  
      class  RadioController
      Controls the radiobuttons assigned to an object of this class.
      class  ToggleButton  
      Methods in com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component with parameters of type Component 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Frame.add​(Component comp)
      Adds a component to the frame to draw
      void Panel.add​(Component comp)
      Adds a component to the panel and sets its relative positioning to the x,y values of the panel
      void Frame.remove​(Component comp)
      removes the component from the frame
      void Panel.remove​(Component comp)
      Removes the component from the panel and resets its offset to the main frame
